messages.content:
Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
freq_ph_detector    PhaseDet(vin,vout,dec,inc); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_zero_freq = 3M from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_pole_freq = lpf_zero_freq from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
                                LPF (vout,gnd); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
freq_ph_detector    PhaseDet(vin,vout,dec,inc); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_r_nom = 0 from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
                                LPF (vco_in, vin); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module dig_pll (vin,gnd,vout); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_zero_freq = lpf_pole_freq from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
charge_pump         #(.iamp(pump_iamp)) QPump (dec,inc,vco_in,gnd)  ; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   electrical vco_out; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
dig_pll_lpf         #(.pole_freq(lpf_zero_freq),.zero_freq(lpf_pole_freq), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
dig_pll_lpf         #(.pole_freq(lpf_pole_freq),.zero_freq(lpf_zero_freq),

 Correction Criteria：Swapped pole and zero frequency parameters, causing incorrect low-pass filter characteristics where the pole uses the zero frequency value and vice versa.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.r_nom(lpf_zero_freq)) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
.r_nom(lpf_r_nom))

 Correction Criteria：Connected the wrong parameter (lpf_zero_freq) to r_nom instead of lpf_r_nom, causing incorrect resistance value in the low-pass filter which will miscalculate pole/zero frequencies.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
charge_pump         #(.iamp(pump_iamp)) QPump (inc,dec,gnd,vco_in)  ; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module dig_pll (vin,gnd,vout); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
charge_pump         #(.iamp(pump_iamp)) QPump (dec,inc,vco_in,gnd)  ; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vco_gain = -1M from (-inf:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_r_nom = 10 from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
LPF (gnd,vco_in); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
charge_pump         #(.iamp(pump_iamp)) QPump (inc,dec,gnd,vco_in)  ; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_r_nom = 10K frm (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real pump_iamp = 1m from (0:inf Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
                                LPF (vco_in gnd); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real lpf_r_nom = 10K from (0:inf; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   dig_vco             #(.center_freq(vco_cen_freq).vco_gain(vco_gain) ) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
   dig_vco             #(.center_freq(vco_cen_freq),.vco_gain(vco_gain) )

 Correction Criteria：Missing comma between parameter assignments and misspelled parameter name '.center_freq' as '.center_freq' causing syntax errors

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
           dig_vco             #(.center_freq(vco_cen_freq).vco_gain(vco_gain) ) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
           dig_vco             #(.center_freq(vco_cen_freq),.vco_gain(vco_gain) )

 Correction Criteria：Missing comma between two named parameter assignments in module instantiation, causing adjacent tokens without separator

corrected code：
dig_pll_lpf         #(.pole_freq(lpf_pole_freq),.zero_freq(lpf_zero_freq),

 Correction Criteria：Missing trailing comma after the second parameter assignment, which breaks the parameter list continuation since the next line starts with another parameter (.r_nom)
